project.name: Overlays
project.description: The Gentoo Overlays team is responsible for the administration of the overlays and the *.overlays.gentoo.org websites.

p.b: What we do, and who we are

longdescription.p: The Gentoo Overlays team looks after *.overlays.gentoo.org websites. We work with infra to provide the service to Gentoo projects and developers. We create and administer individual overlays. We keep abreast of changes in the needs of anyone running an overlay, so that we can keep the service useful to everyone who wants to use it.

goals.p: Our goal is to provide a central home for overlays.

body.p: The best way to reach us on IRC is the #gentoo-overlays channel on irc.freenode.net.
